metadata.title: CVE-2023-52495 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: soc:qcom: pmic_glink_altmode: fix port sanity check The PMIC GLINK altmodedriver currently supports at most two ports. Fix the incomplete port sanitycheck on notifications to avoid accessing and corrupting memory beyond theport array if we ever get a notification for an unsupported port.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
